comments:
An NPE occurs when creating a SpringGraphViewer since a getModel on the AbstractStructureGraphViewer triggers a createModel before the inputChanged method is called and the modelFactory attribute is set.

I have fixed this to use the same technique as the static graph viewer to create the graph.  It looks like a bunch of the static graph viewer should be duplicated here (or this should be slightly refactored).  Let me know if this fixes your problem.  

Also, unless you need the "moving nodes", checkout the static graph viewer.  I am going to rename these viewers sometime this week.

I have applied the patch and it went through, only to complain a bit later with the following:

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.StackOverflowError

The stack overflow is a problem in the Fade layout algorithm.  This layout has been removed from Zest so it is no longer relevant.
